text:
NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTERS
OFFICE OF THE TREASURER
14 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
February 12, 1954
MEMO
Tos NAEB Board of Directors
ccs Harry Skornia
From: Frank E. Sohooley
Res Proposed EBF deal
I have Just received Allen Miller additional data
regarding the proposal that EBF be given a contract to
prombte and sell NAEB albums*
For reasons, I believe I explained at our Ames
Board meeting, I am still opposed to making any such
agreement now with EBF or with anyone else.
I vote NO*
I would have voted NO at Ames.
